attributes.action: To swab all pregnant woman for strep b.
attributes.additional_details:
The government pay for many things like people who take drugs or alcoholics yet a simple £11 swab is not advised for pregnant mums when pregnant? 

Pregnant woman do not ask to have strep b but yet there are things people do that are there choice yet get help..
attributes.background: Many woman are not tested for strep b during pregnancy and many babies die from this infection. Woman who do have strep b could be swabbed and if positive, simple anti biotics for the mother and baby will save lives and heart ache
